page.title: 15LOCAL DIALECT STORY
page.content: "Aye aye lads fooe ye deing? Didnae think you'd be at the match in wither lik iss." "Weill we geid it some thocht an we cam doon to meet the lads at the match" "Gosh its affa cal." "Aye." "Ye comin doon te the pub?" "Och aye." "Look, here we are aready min." "Three pints Geordy!" "Comin up." "Ers i wife. Ers twa o the wife!" "Your seein double Andy you've hid a few." "Come on oot ye go min." "Fits the wifes daein we those twa lads?" "Yer still seein double Andy,an that's yer brither in la.Noo awa hame."
